page.title: 11VIEWS OF FLEETWOOD:Visitors.
page.content: On separate occasions visitors and residents were interviewed in Memorial Park. To the query: "What do you think of Fleetwood?" the{visitors'}replies were, verbatim: {"}Fleetwood is an interesting town because there's plenty to see, especially the park and beach{";"}- a pleasant resort because of the fresh air and it's not crowded{";"}The sea front makes it an attractive town{"}; { "}It's pleasant{"};{"}It has a good market{"};{"}- a nice place: nice and tidy{"};{"}-an attractive town because of its quiet and wide roads{"};{"}- a well-planned town{"};{"}It's quiet and pleasant{"};{"}It has clean air and it's not crowded{"};{"}The park, the beach and the sea front are the best things about the town{"}.
